Liver disease
Liver disease
The term "liver disease" applies to many conditions that stop the liver from working or prevent it from functioning well. Abdominal pain or swelling, yellowing of the skin or eyes (
jaundice
), or abnormal results of
liver function tests
may suggest you have liver disease.
